settings.text:
Weather you like us, LOVE us, or have some feedback for us, let us know!!


*If you want to directly email us :Stringbeansandpotatoes@gmail.com

*If you want to talk to a real vegetable, you can’t….they don’t talk. But if you want to talk to a real human: click on the "chat" bubble. (M-F, 10am-5pm EST)

*If you want to influence: @stringbeansandpotatoes

*If you want to meet in real life: Mullers Ice Cream Shoppe, NJ

settings.title: Subject
settings.option_8: I have a funny veggie joke to share!

settings.text: Below are some of are common questions:

settings.title: How do I know if my order is confirmed?
settings.text: This is an example of a response that you might give. It's good to be as thorough as possible in responses as that has a tendency to improve trust overall.
